spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.

Taking damage has a chance to call your Personal Absorb-o-Tron, absorbing 50% of damage taken over 20 sec, up to 321.

Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 30.

Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you 25 applications of Overwhelming Power. Each stack of Overwhelming Power grants 1 Haste. An application of Overwhelming Power is removed every 1 sec or whenever you take damage.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to grow or shrink the world. Shrinking the world grants you 15 primary stat and 375 maximum health for 10 sec. Growing the world grants you 53 Haste and 25% movement speed for 10 sec.

Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 25.
Your Lava Burst deals 14 additional damage, and your Lava Surge chance is increased to 18%.

spells.description: Equip: Increases your Kul Tiran or Zandalari Engineering by 20.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fierce Gladiator's Ringmail Helm

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: Focus excess Azerite energy into the Heart of Azeroth, then expel that energy outward, dealing 829 Fire damage to all enemies in front of you over 2.6 sec. Castable while moving.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Your damaging spells and abilities grant you 2 Haste for 4 sec, stacking up to 10 times. This Haste is lost if you stop using spells or abilities against the initial target.

When you have no stacks of Focused Energy, generate 3 stacks from your first damaging spell or ability.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Versatility by 1 for 14 sec, stacking up to 5 times. Being the vicitim of a loss of control or movement impairing effect also grants a stack of Strife.

Reduces the cooldown of Storm Elemental by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Storm Elemental, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,546 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 198 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
